TMP4="rpi4"
TMP4v7="rpi4v7"
TMP3="rpi3"
TMP3v7="rpi3v7"
TMP0="rpi0"
# do not edit above this line

# stage1
RPI4="2575MB"
RPI3="2575MB"
RPI0="2250MB"
DEBIAN_VERSION="buster"

PKGS1="tzdata keyboard-configuration sudo man-db dbus initramfs-tools \
	cloud-initramfs-growroot e2fsprogs u-boot-tools fonty-rg patch \
	curl wget apt-transport-https dirmngr cmake rsync psmisc"

PKGS2="cpu hwinfo neofetch haveged resolvconf git build-essential net-tools \
        ifplugd fuse wpasupplicant wireless-tools usbutils alsa-utils gettext \
        bison flex mc nano figlet toilet curl dialog python3 python3-setuptools \
        openssh-client openssh-server ntfs-3g bc zram-tools libncursesw5-dev \
        libssl-dev autopoint autoconf automake pkg-config libtool fake-hwclock \
	python python-setuptools"

FIRMWARE="firmware-linux"

# https://archive.raspberrypi.org/debian/pool/main/r/rpi-eeprom/
EEPROM_VERSION="7.0"

# motd
BRAND4="Raspberry Pi 4B"
BRAND3="Raspberry Pi 3B"
